table.caption: Silverquill Scholars
rows: Bantermage, using incisive observation to pierce rivals' confidence
Duskmage, conjuring inky voids of shadow magic
Inkcaster, summoning living inklings to service
Lumimancer, bringing light to bear on shameful situations and holding corrupt institutions to account
Shadewing, forming weapons from darkness to slice and stab at foes
Silvertongue, bathing others in the light of inspiring words
Vainglory, wielding the power of a perfectly crafted compliment to enhance a person's best qualities
Warsinger, stirring hearts through poetic performance and song
table.name: Scholars of Silverquill; Silverquill Scholars
